jobs_description.title: University Institute of Technology (IUT)
jobs_description.description: First year in Dijon (21) and second year in Troyes (10). Web development courses, graphic production, and communication strategy mainly. Aiming to specialize in web development.

jobs_description.title: Lycée Camille Claudel, Troyes (10)
jobs_description.description: Specialties in mathematics and social sciences with the expert mathematics option. Mentioned with honors (12.78 / 20)

projects.title: LPA Event (professional project)
projects.description: The first platform to check the schedules of intercity bus terminals in Estelí, Nicaragua.

projects.title: Agenda (university project)
projects.description: In this project, we created an interactive site to explore the influence of socio-demographic criteria on elections in France. I designed an original interface with interactive bubbles representing each criterion (income, age, gender, etc.), allowing the user to freely navigate. This visual choice helped me stand out from classic presentations and reinforced my skills in web design and interactive design.

projects.title: Vibropolis (personal project)
projects.description: Discover an essential tool for freelancers and businesses in Nicaragua. Our Payoneer Nicaragua Calculator allows you to accurately and quickly calculate fees and commissions when receiving international payments through Payoneer. Start using it today and take control of your finances!

projects.title: Results (university project)
projects.description: In this project, we created an interactive site to explore the influence of socio-demographic criteria on elections in France. I designed an original interface with interactive bubbles representing each criterion (income, age, gender, etc.), allowing the user to freely navigate. This visual choice helped me stand out from classic presentations and reinforced my skills in web design and interactive design.

projects.title: PokeWorld (personal project)
projects.description: This project is a personal effort to practice handling APIs with Vue.js and Tailwind CSS. It's an application that displays detailed Pokémon profiles by fetching their data via an external API. I added a feature to mark Pokémon as favorites and find them in a dedicated section.

projects.title: Utopia (university project)
projects.description:
I recreated the website of an existing cinema, Utopia Cinema in Pont-Sainte-Marie. First, I analyzed the website to identify its strengths and weaknesses. I then conducted a competitor study and proposed a graphic charter including the logo and visual identity.

After imagining the site structure, I created an interactive mockup using Figma.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Currently at IUT Troyes, I am looking for an apprenticeship for my third and final year.
about.description: I am passionate about web development and website creation. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow in this field.

contact.title: Ready to bring your ideas to life?
contact.subtitle: I can boost your project or join your team.
